title: Phobia: 10 Chilling Recollections of Horror
description: Aspiring author, P.H. Whitley, has finally arrived on the scene with his much anticipated debut book just in time for the chilly fall season. Ten horrific short-stories await you in the pages of this enthralling novella. These nightmarish tales are sure to send a shiver down your spine and strike fear in your heart. An elderly man awaiting death, a jailbird utterly alone in his cell, and a pretentious young woman who is terrified of aging are only a few of the startling characters you will encounter in this collection of stories. Mind you, these tales are not for the weak-hearted...
author: P.H. Whitley
